name: Angler King
overview: Angler King is a fishing arcade game that was released by Namco in 1998, only in Japan; it runs on the company's System 23 hardware, features three different selectable fishers, and utilizes a virtual harpoon gun mounted to the front of its cabinet, but much like their two X-Day games, not much else is known about it because it does not work properly in MAME.
